title: Immersive Investors – Global Schema
description: Schema for immersive investors, institutions, projects, policies and people in immersive infrastructures and experiences.

dataset_metadata.description: Metadata describing the dataset as a whole.

dataset_id.description: Stable identifier for the dataset, e.g. IMMERSIVE_INVESTORS_GLOBAL.

description.description: Short description of the dataset scope and intent.

author.description: Primary curator or maintainer of the dataset.

license.description: License under which the dataset is published.

geographic_scope.description: High-level description of the geographic scope (e.g. global with Arab-region pilot).

primary_focus_regions.description: Regions that are currently most represented in the dataset.

related_datasets.description: References to related immersive datasets (destinations, skills, creative directors etc.).

repo_path.description: Optional relative path inside the immersive-datasets or other repos.

snapshot_date.description: ISO date (YYYY-MM-DD) representing the snapshot date of this dataset version.

last_reviewed.description: ISO date (YYYY-MM-DD) when the dataset as a whole was last curator-reviewed.

investors.description: List of investor entities relevant for immersive infrastructures and experiences.

description.description: Short descriptive text summarising the investor and its immersive relevance.

country.description: Country where the investor is primarily based.

country_iso2.description: ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code, where applicable.

world_region.description: Macro region label, e.g. MENA_GCC, EUROPE, NORTH_AMERICA, GLOBAL.

ownership_structure.description: Summary of ownership and governance (e.g. state-owned, listed company, family-controlled).

governance_type.description: Optional field describing governance structure, boards, etc.

main_website.description: Primary website URL of the investor.

fund_size_overall.description: Approximate overall fund size if documented (free-text to avoid false precision).

estimated_immersive_allocation.description: Free-text description for any quantification of immersive allocation (if sources provide enough detail).

immersive_notes.description: Additional notes about immersive investments (e.g. specific projects, strategic statements).

preferred_stages.description: Typical investment stages for immersive-related projects.

ticket_size.description: Free-text description of typical ticket sizes for immersive-related investments (no hallucinated ranges).

investment_instruments.description: Investment instruments used for immersive-related investments.

project_location_profile.description: Typical project-location archetypes the investor is open to (conceptual, not a country list).

immersive_modalities_focus.description: Immersive modalities and venue types the investor is demonstrably comfortable financing.

ppp_profile.description: Description of public–private partnership patterns (e.g. typical PPP roles).

vision_alignment.description: Links to national visions or strategies (e.g. Saudi Vision 2030) where relevant.

immersive_projects.description: List of project IDs that are explicitly linked to this investor in an immersive context.

key_people.description: List of person IDs with key roles in immersive-related decision-making for this investor.

tags.description: Free-form tags for search and clustering.

sources.description: List of sources backing the investor entry.

data_valid_as_of.description: ISO date indicating when this information was last confirmed.

last_checked.description: ISO date of last manual or automated validation.

institutions.description: List of institutions linked to immersive investment (e.g. ministries, development agencies, holding companies).

institution_type.description: Type of institution (ministry, agency, development company, holding, etc.).

description.description: Short description of the institution and its immersive relevance.

linked_investors.description: List of investor IDs linked to this institution.

linked_policies.description: List of policy IDs linked to this institution.

sources.description: List of sources backing the institution entry.

data_valid_as_of.description: ISO date indicating when this information was last confirmed.

last_checked.description: ISO date of last manual or automated validation.

projects.description: List of immersive-related projects and infrastructures.

project_type.description: Type of project (e.g. giga_project, theme_park, museum, dome, XR_venue, mixed_use_district).

country.description: Country where the project is located.

city_or_region.description: City or region where the project is located.

linked_destination_ids.description: Optional references to destination entities in other datasets.

start_year.description: Approximate start year or announcement year, if known.

lead_investor_ids.description: List of investor IDs acting as lead investors.

co_investor_ids.description: List of investor IDs acting as co-investors.

operator_institutions.description: Institution IDs of operators or developers.

immersive_formats.description: Immersive formats present in the project.

soft_power_goals.description: Free-text description of soft-power, tourism or educational goals where documented.

global_south_flag.description: True if the project is located in, or primarily targets, Global South contexts as defined in the methodology.

offshore_flag.description: True if the project is located on an island, artificial island, or offshore zone (e.g. special economic zone at sea).

sources.description: List of sources backing the project entry.

data_valid_as_of.description: ISO date indicating when this information was last confirmed.

last_checked.description: ISO date of last manual or automated validation.

policies.description: List of policies, strategies and vision documents relevant for immersive investments.

policy_name.description: Name of the policy or strategy.

description.description: Short description of the policy and its immersive relevance.

strategic_relevance.description: Description of how the policy supports or frames immersive investments.

institutions_responsible.description: List of institution IDs responsible for this policy.

sources.description: List of sources backing the policy entry.

data_valid_as_of.description: ISO date indicating when this information was last confirmed.

last_checked.description: ISO date of last manual or automated validation.

people.description: List of people with relevant roles in immersive investments.

role.description: Role title, as stated in sources.

organisation.description: Organisation with which the person is associated.

country.description: Country associated with the person (typically based on the organisation location).

responsibility_area.description: Short description of responsibility area related to immersive investments.

sources.description: List of sources backing the person entry.

data_valid_as_of.description: ISO date indicating when this information was last confirmed.

last_checked.description: ISO date of last manual or automated validation.

meta_instructions_for_ai.description: Guidance for AI agents using or extending the dataset.

purpose.description: High-level description of how AI agents should use this dataset.

do_not.description: List of forbidden behaviours (for example hallucinating investors).

update_policy.description: Rules for when and how AI agents may propose updates.

allowed_transformations.description: Types of transformations that downstream tools may perform (for example filtering, enrichment, cross-linking).

breaking_change_policy.description: Policy for introducing breaking changes to the schema.

contact_for_issues.description: Contact information for reporting issues with the dataset.

source.description: Source backing a specific data point or entity.

title.description: Optional title or label for the source.

accessed.description: Date when the source was accessed.
